result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Obed David Lopez

records.addlTxt: Order for Defendant to View Digital Discovery, signed and filed.
Received, Filed, and Forwarded to the Judge for review; Motion to View Digital Discovery

Defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, in custody.  Attorney Brian Nelson appeared by video for Obed David Lopez.  Attorney Elaine B. Fehrs appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Attorney Brian Nelson in court, defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, in custody.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Victim appeared by zoom.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests additional status conference date to meet with defendant.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.  Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Brian Nelson in court, defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, in custody.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Status conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Obed David Lopez in court with Attorney Brian Nelson.  Defendant Obed David Lopez in custody.  Elaine Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for status following 22CF2050. Matter is adjourned to Br. 35.  Status conference scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

CASE HEARD IN PRELIM FOR BR. 35:
Defendant Obed David Lopez in court with Attorney Brian Nelson; both appear by video.  Defendant Obed David Lopez in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer N. Dathe. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Motion for PR Bond.  (Obed D. Lopez - #2022001476, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Attorney Brian Nelson in court, defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, in custody.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for preliminary hearing and order to show cause hearing. Defense counsel has just been appointed and requests an adjournment. Court grants request. Court finds good CAUSE to adjourn preliminary hearing. Case adjourned to Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Obed David Lopez in court with attorney Thomas Holland Reed appearing as a friend of the Court.  Defendant Obed David Lopez in custody.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for hearing. Court hears arguments. For reasons as set forth on the record, Court adjourns case for preliminary hearing. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, defendant in custody.  Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Letter from defendant re:  no representation/attorney.  (Obed D. Lopez - #2022001476, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Obed David Lopez in court with attorney Tom Reed.  Defendant Obed David Lopez in custody.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for hearing. Court hears arguments. For reasons as set forth on the record, Court adjourns case for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, defendant in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Obed David Lopez not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision with Electronic Monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to be released and placed on the waiting list.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Obed David Lopez in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Obed David Lopez in custody.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Obed David Lopez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  AS TO COUNT 1:  Court DISMISSED incorrect "domestic abuse repeater" enhancer.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Case is adjourned to Br. PE for Br. 35.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court dismissed incorrect "domestic abuse repeater" enhance in Count 1.

Court ordered no contact with AMS, dob 9/11/1992
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
